name: Cant't stop the pidgeon
description:
You can't stop the pidgeon (that is different from the pigeon) because the pidgeon is wild!

It runs, runs, jumps, runs, jumps, runs, jumps, jumps, jumps, runs, jumps, runs, runs, jumps, runs, jumps, runs, jumps, jumps, jumps, runs, jumps, runs, runs, jumps, runs, jumps, runs, jumps, jumps, jumps, runs, jumps, runs.

This game is an endless runner. Touch to jump.
